scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment && npm run sync
scripts.deploy-plugins: npm run deploy-react ; npm run deploy-angular ; cd ../dragon
scripts.deploy-react: cd ../react-dragon ; git pull ; npm i -S dragon@* ; git commit package.json -m 'bumped dragon version'; npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-angular: cd ../angular-dragon ; git pull ; npm i -S dragon@* ; git commit package.json -m 'bumped dragon version'; npm run deploy
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && bower version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.scripts: jshint . && browserify -s dragon -do dist/dragon.js dragon.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/dragon.min.js dist/dragon.js
scripts.dev: watchify -dvo example/example.min.js example/example.js & watchify -dvs dragon -o dist/dragon.js dragon.js & stylus -w dragon.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist
scripts.styles: stylus dragon.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist && cleancss dist/dragon.css -o dist/dragon.min.css
scripts.sync: git checkout gh-pages ; git merge master ; git push ; git checkout master
scripts.test: npm run lint && browserify test/*.js | tape-run
